LanguageData.RPSecurityDoor.label: Neurosis Security Door
LanguageData.RPSecurityDoor.description: Divides rooms. Powered operation allows people to move through the door without slowing down. This door has additional biometric sensors that can allow it to detect if a colonist is in an abnormal mental state and "intervene".
LanguageData.RPSecurityDoor_Blueprint.label: Neurosis Security Door (blueprint)
LanguageData.RPSecurityDoor_Frame.label: Neurosis Security Door (building)
LanguageData.RPSecurityDoor_Frame.description: Divides rooms. Powered operation allows people to move through the door without slowing down. This door has additional biometric sensors that can allow it to detect if a colonist is in an abnormal mental state and "intervene".
